        List<String> getAssociatedFrom(String context)
        Method to get a list of contexts that the given context has been associated to.

      • addAssociation

        void addAssociation(String fromContext,
                  String toContext)
        Method to create a unidirectional association from one context to another.
        Parameters:
        fromContext - The context from which to make the association.
        toContext - The context to make the association to.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user doesn't have permission to perform this action.

      • removeAssociation

        void removeAssociation(String fromContext,
                     String toContext)
        Method to remove the unidirectional association from one context to another.
        Parameters:
        fromContext - The context the association was made from.
        toContext - The context the association was made to.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user doesn't have permission to perform this action.
